name: 行くぞ! GRAND COSMIC DUNKMASTER: Neo Extremist Ballistic V
name_original: 行くぞ! GRAND COSMIC DUNKMASTER: Neo Extremist Ballistic V
description:
いくぞ！ＧＲＡＮＤ　ＣＯＳＭＩＣ　ＤＵＮＫＭＡＳＴＥＲ：Ｎｅｏ　Ｅｘｔｒｅｍｉｓｔ　Ｂａｌｌｉｓｔｉｃ　Ｖ　ＥＰＩＳＯＤＥ　0ＴＨ

WebGL Version doesnt want to play nice so it's not available.

Entry to the AGDG Space Jam 2016. Go play the other Jam entries! They're really good!

WASD for movement, Shift to slow down

Hold Left Click to charge shot

Release Left Click to shoot

Press Right Click to destroy shot

Press space to deflect shot!

THE GAME ENDS AFTER THE SONG FINISHES. IT'S NOT A BUG. IT'S A FEATURE!!!
